I'll try this again.
My verification failed yesterday because of the way @tina packages my posts from this submit form. If i copy the text exactly as it appears in the astro post archive, then it verifies OK. 
This isn't a great user experience. For text proofs, I need to adjust the algorithm for storing and validating hashes.  I actually thought i was doing something like:

1. take string
2. remove all CR LF
3. convert to lower case
4. create hash

but it seems not. I'll need to work on that.
I also need to work on some fuzzy matching logic. bit level hash is too restrictive. 
 
Lets see what tina does with this:

```
My proof for today,
its the second time we've tried.
Will it work this time?
```

https://app.proveitsme.io/verify/Y4JBf6TMaA
